str2: The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
From kata and a derivative of artios; to complete thoroughly, i.e. Repair or adjust.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From hustereo; a deficit; specially, poverty.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
